views.markdown:
Version 1.1.5 - Added support for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12. Version 1.1.4-2
- Hopefully Last iOS 9.0.2 Issues Fixes.
- General Improvements.


Version 1.1.4-1
- Hopefully Fixed the Crashes on iOS 9 for some Users (thanks so much my Friend @karimouni24 for testing Stuff).


Version 1.1.4
- Added the iOS 11 Support.
- Changes in Prefs Labels.
- Code Fixes.
Version 1.1.3
- Added the option to Enable Pinch To Close Feature for closing Folders.
- Added the option to Enable Nested Folders in Folders Feature (included the Relative Option of my other TitleFolderSize Tweak).
- Now you can Donate Me (thanks) with the New Label in Preferences Panel.
- Added Twitter, My Repo and Donations Icons Labels.
- Changes in Labels Description in Prefs.
Version 1.1.2
- Added the option to Enable Empty Folders when removing all the Apps inside (thanks sinfool for the tip).
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia with the New Label in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels Description in Prefs.
Version 0.0.1-18
- Added the option to enable the Dim Effect when opening a Folder (incorporation of OpenFolderDim on my Personal Repository).
Version 0.0.1-16
- Added the option to enable the View of the StatusBar when opened a Folder (iOS 10 only).
- Options in Settings Improved and small Modifications.


Version 0.0.1-15
- Added the option to make Background Folders Black when closed (iOS 10 only).


Version 0.0.1-14
- Added the option to hide Blur inside Folders (iOS 10 only).


Version 0.0.1-12
- Updated for iOS 10 the option to hide the Folder Background when open (thanks @halston696 for the help).


Version 0.0.1-11
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.
Version 0.0.1-10
- Added the option to hide the Outside Folder View (enabling Transparent Background when the Folders are closed).
- Some improvements in the Settings Panel.
- Code Cleanup.
Version 0.0.1-6
- Redefined the code: now the effect while opening and closing a Folder is cuter.
- Added the option to hide the blur of the background inside a Folder.
- Made a little change inside the Preferences Panel.
